title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: Set in the Jazz Age on Long Island, this novel tells the story of mysterious millionaire Jay Gatsby

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society where critical thinking is suppressed

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A romantic novel following the character of Elizabeth Bennet and her love story

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A fantasy novel about the adventures of Bilbo Baggins in Middle-earth

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A story about racial injustice and the loss of innocence in the American South
